verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
Thank you for the privilege
Of seeking your face
Thank you for the confidence
To enter this place
And to lift my hands
And sing your praise
And worship you

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord you are holy and righteous
Your word is faithful and true
I'm overwhelmed by your presence here
And all I can do is....

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Thank you for the privilege
Of seeking your face
Thank you for the confidence
To enter this place
And to lift my hands
And sing your praise
And worship you
